company_name: YASREF Yanbu Aramco Sinopec Refining Co.
policy_holder: YASREF Yanbu Aramco Sinopec Refining Co.

coverage_details.menopausal: Covered up to Annual Limit. All natural changes that relate to menopause are covered.
coverage_details.checkup: Not Covered (general check-ups once a year are covered up to SR 1,500)
coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit including Hajj, Umra, Schools & Seasonal Vaccinations
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit -- SR 1,500.00; all lens specifications covered up to optical limit; frame limit 1,000 SR
coverage_details.organ_transplant: All types of organ transplant covered, including fresh, synthetic, bone marrow, cochlea, up to policy limits.
coverage_details.psychiatric: SR 50,000.00; Acute and chronic psychotic cases covered up to 50,000 SR and not limited to number of sessions.
coverage_details.hearing_aids_audiometry: Hearing aids: SR 6,000.00; Advanced hearing aids covered up to 6,000 SR
coverage_details.neo_natal_care: Covered up to Annual Limit; Neonatal care from day 1 is covered
coverage_details.congenital: Covered up to Annual Limit; non-life threatening congenital disease & deformities are covered
coverage_details.maternity: SR 20,000.00; External/extra doctor fees for maternity are covered within maternity limit
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,500.00; Optical is covered for all members. Vision correction, including lazik, is covered up to SR 6,000 (not restricted to optical limit)
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Covered up to Annual Limit; all types of therapies including physiotherapy as medically required. Occupational therapy covered. Decompression machine treatment covered.
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Medication pre-authorization approval limit: SR 2,000; general medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit. Protocol for general pre-approval applies as standard.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Obesity covered up to 20,000 SR. Companion charges covered for all. Singular, Warts, Osteoporosis, and local injection (in joints) are covered. Rehabilitation, congenital, neonatal care from day 1, physiotherapy, hearing & visual aids, vaccination, pre-existing & chronic conditions are covered. Artificial limbs, prosthesis & medical equipment covered. Transportation of mortal remains SR 10,000. Home/visitor doctor covered up to 400 SR/visit. Allergies and testing, all types of organ transplant, kidney dialysis, annual checkups (SR 1,500), speech difficulties (15,000 SR), blood pressure/diabetes/advanced device coverage. Dressings, crutches, medical braces, pharmaceutical disposables included. Wheelchair (up to 600 SR), vitamins & tonics for pregnancy, supports for joints, decompression/occupational therapy, deviated nasal septum, herbal medicine, acne, Vitamin D test/medication, dental root planning/scaling/types, developmental, lens specs. RTA coverage even if motorcycle. Chiropractor covered. Sleep apnea and sleep study covered. Newborns born outside KSA covered if mother under policy. Transportation of mortal remains 10,000 SR.
